page.title: 01Titley Kington
page.content:
This block is fairly rural mixed farming, sheep, cattle some corn and hay crops.
The local kennels have a good pack and hunt Monday, Wednesday, and Fridays during the seson. Trout in the river private fishing, Eywood Pool a quiet bird sanctuary.
Not many young people live here, more retired people most of the houses are privately owned.
The post office only opens 2 afternoons a week and the only small shop, closes endd of 1985. There is only 1 bus service to Kington on a Tuesday. The churchyard ws awrded 2nd prize in a recent competition, the running of the Church is not happy among some of the older parishoners
